page.title: 06Games People Play
page.content: Here are some of the games children in our area play: {Wally} For this game you will need more than two players, a tennis ball, and a blank wall. Draw a line about one metre up the wall and another on the ground. The object of the game is to kick the ball above the line on the wall and after the line on the ground. Each player takes a turn. {Kick the Can} To play this game you need about 6 players and a tin can. The game is like {Hide and Seek}except that if you are caught you hope that some of the others will make it back to base, kick the can away, and so free you again. {Football Tennis }2 players are needed (4 for doubles), a wall or a net about one metre high and a tennis ball.It's like real tennis only you use your head, knees or feet to hit the ball.
